channel.title: Undo Doesn't Work in the Journal
channel.description:
I like to copy/paste a lot in the journal and that works flawlessly but I had a game where I lost a lot of information last night because I was unable to Ctrl + Z and undo something I did.
feelsbadman

item.title: Undo Doesn't Work in the Journal

item.description:
I’ll just leave this here…

item.title: Undo Doesn't Work in the Journal
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
I was unaware you couldn’t undo things in the journal. Never thought to test it. Will add the ability to undo in the next patch.

Read full topic
item.source: Undo Doesn't Work in the Journal

item.title: Undo Doesn't Work in the Journal
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
I’m not sure tbh that’s why I added the question mark like this (?) I like the idea btw (if it’s not a bug :p)

Read full topic

item.title: Undo Doesn't Work in the Journal
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
I’d respectfully disagree with you.

Being able to undo should work in every text/paragraph field on a computer. It feels like a bug to me.

Read full topic
